# podenv

TPU Cluster Interactive Initialization Tool.

## Installation

```bash
pip install podenv
```

## Usage

```bash
# Full initialization mode
podenv

# IP only mode
podenv --iponly
```

## Features

- Configure TPU node IP list
- Auto-configure SSH passwordless login
- Optional GitHub SSH key configuration
- Auto-install fabric and related tools

## Requirements

- Linux system
- Bash shell
- Python 3.7+
